title: Tin Foil Hat #54: Net Neutrality and Libertarianism with Dave Smith
description:
Welcome to a passionate episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. On this his episode, Sam and Ryan welcome from the Legion Of Skanks' Dave Smith. This episode we discuss....
1) Dave's stand-up special "Libertas"
2) Artist taking back power and the death of corporate entertainment
3) Libertarism
4) Striving for peace
5) The ineffective "War On Drugs"
6) Net Neutrality & The FCC
7) Corporations vs The Government
8) S.720 - Israel Anti-Boycott Act
Thank you for your support. For bonus content please check out Patreon.com/TinFoilHat!
